channel.title: Leetcode Solutions on Tranquility
channel.description: Recent content in Leetcode Solutions on Tranquility

item.title: Medium
item.description: [179] Largest Number [495] Teemo Attacking [1094] Car Pooling Medium [179] Largest Number Overide the Comparator to self-compare in dict order e.g.: if s1=“76”, s2=“53”, str1 = s1 + s2=“7653”, str2 = s2 + s1=“5375” in which case str2 < str1 call Arrays.Sort() with new comparator mind the corner case with all zero [1094] Car Pooling Use one-hot int array to record numbers at every location on and off the bus Compute all the locations and compare with capacity Two circle Time: O(n), Runtime: 100% [495] Teemo Attacking Compare last time + duration and current time Time: O(n), Runtime: 99.
